reviewText: I bought this DVD to run on an old projection HD TV in my basement during a big party that was sure to overflow down there.  It worked great on the old TV and people were really drawn to it. There are options to run continuously with or without sound.  I didn't like the music option that much (too dreary for a party) so I chose the crackling and popping noises of a fire and played music on another device while the fire video ran continuously. I was not too impressed with the candles option, but I bought it for the fireplace and was very pleased with that.
Just okay. Audio is best feature. Video too static. Would prefer video showing firewood burning down to embers. Very boring.
again, another enjoyable dvd with my husband and family.  will buy from this vendor in the future if we are looking for my dvd's of this nature.

This video is so realaistic! And, the fires keep looping so I can have the video going all day long without interuptions!
I have so much fun saying to a guest, "Will you put another log on the fire please" and silly them...it takes 3 seconds to remember I have no fireplace!  :-)
Love it and very relaxing.  I love to play this when I have company. It soothes relaxes and mesmerizes them watching the logs burn.

I recommend this to anyone who wants to add some beauty and serenity to the room. This is just awesome!! When I have the fireplace video on, it looks as though I truly have a fire going. It adds warmth to the room. The music (optional) is very nice also,though it is only one song that plays continously.
